item.title: Project 4 : Comcast
item.description: Data Analysis Import data into Python environment. Provide the trend chart for the number of complaints at monthly and daily granularity levels. Provide a table with the frequency of complaint types. Which complaint types are maximum i.e., around internet, network issues, or across any other domains. Create a new categorical variable with value as Open and Closed. Open & Pending is to be categorized as Open and Closed & Solved is to be categorized as Closed.
